turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Wedge (golf).
turn.1: What is the face angle of the wedge?
turn.2: When included in a club set, it generally has the highest loft of the set.
turn.3: what is the purpose of the wedge?
turn.4: It is used for specialized, extremely high-angle shots such as from the "lip" of a bunker.
turn.5: is the wedge used in any other ways?
turn.6: This wedge is generally made by specialty companies, and some argue that their purpose is redundant, as a regular lob wedge can be "opened" for extra loft in situations calling for such a high launch angle.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: However, these shots are very tricky to make as they require substantial changes to a player's normal swing mechanics.
turn.9: what is the history of the wedge?
turn.10: Flannery & Leech, "Golf Through The Ages, 600 Years of Golfing Art".
